member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_DECODE_SUPPORT_FLAGS
member.summary: Specifies whether a video decoding operation is supported.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_DECODE_SUPPORT_FLAGS.D3D12_VIDEO_DECODE_SUPPORT_FLAG_NONE

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_DECODE_SUPPORT_FLAGS.D3D12_VIDEO_DECODE_SUPPORT_FLAG_SUPPORTED
member.summary: The video decoding operation is supported.
